mapper.select: SELECT t1.menu_id as t1_id,t1.menu_name as t1_name,t1.p_id as t1_pid,t2.menu_id as t2_id,t2.menu_name as t2_name,t2.p_id as t2_pid, t3.menu_id as t3_id,t3.menu_name as t3_name,t3.p_id as t3_pid,t4.menu_id as t4_id,t4.menu_name as t4_name,t4.p_id as t4_pid, t5.menu_id as t5_id,t5.menu_name as t5_name,t5.p_id as t5_pid,t6.menu_id as t6_id,t6.menu_name as t6_name,t6.p_id as t6_pid FROM tree_menu1 t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tree_menu2 t2 ON t1.menu_id=t2.p_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tree_menu3 t3 on t2.menu_id=t3.p_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tree_menu4 t4 ON t3.menu_id=t4.p_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tree_menu5 t5 ON t4.menu_id=t5.p_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tree_menu6 t6 ON t5.menu_id=t6.p_id
select menu_name from tree_menu5 where menu_id=#{pId}

SELECT t1.menu_id as t1_id,t2.menu_id as t2_id,t3.menu_id as t3_id,t4.menu_id as t4_id,t5.menu_id as t5_id,t6.menu_id as t6_id FROM tree_menu1 t1 JOIN tree_menu2 t2 ON t1.menu_id=t2.p_id JOIN tree_menu3 t3 ON t2.menu_id=t3.p_id JOIN tree_menu4 t4 ON t3.menu_id=t4.p_id JOIN tree_menu5 t5 ON t4.menu_id=t5.p_id JOIN tree_menu6 t6 ON (t5.menu_id=t6.p_id AND t6.menu_id=#{menuId})
select menu_name from tree_menu6 where menu_name =#{menuName}
